channel.title: R on Suzan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Suzan

item.title: Data Wrangling Part 1: Basic to Advanced Ways to Select Columns
item.description: I went through the entire dplyr documentation for a talk last week about pipes, which resulted in a few “aha!” moments. I discovered and re-discovered a few useful functions, which I wanted to collect in a few blog posts so I can share them with others. This first post will cover ordering, naming and selecting columns. The next post will be about recoding and transforming columns, and after that I will move on to row selection.
